subject: Ice Skating
Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Heather Richardson won the women’s 500 and 1,000 meters and Shani Davis took the men’s 1,000, each taking the overall sprint lead at the United States Long Track Speedskating National Championships at the Pettit National Ice Center in West Allis, Wis.
